Texts.Eng: Don't forget that certain plants are ^orange;almost essential^reset; for a viable gene-research laboratory. At the very least, you'll want Mutavisk and Bracken seeds for the resources they produce.

Every great botanist needs to start somewhere. With a ^orange;Greenhouse^reset; in your home you can craft all sorts of plants that bestow ^orange;fantastic buffs and abilities^reset; to make your life easier. Build one now.
